_tournament_mode: Always enabled - players accumulate chips across hands until tournament end
_trueskill2_note: TrueSkill ratings updated only at tournament end based on final chip standings

env_init_kwargs._comment_models: Use --player_models in runner to specify different AI models for each player
env_init_kwargs._example_usage: python multi_agent_runner.py --game_name texasholdem --player_models gpt-4o-mini claude-3-5-sonnet gemini-2.5-flash --num_players 3
